participant_1.background:
I could not be a member of a band if I were blind because I would not be able to read the music or play my instrument.
i hate cleaning.
I am short, but I am still able to do my work on the farm.
Social media is not my thing.
i wonder what it would be like to be a different gender.

participant_2.background:
I live in Manhattan with my wife and two kids.
I get to spend lots of time playing and laughing with my kids.
i have bowled a 300 game twice in my life.
until recently i have never been able to sing in front of anyone.
I often take my kids out to dinner to remind me of my childhood.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! How is your day going?
It is going well, thanks! What are you up to today?
I am spending some time with my kids and then I have a bowling league meeting.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am just working on the farm today.
That is awesome! I have always wanted to live on a farm.
It is a lot of work, but it is also very rewarding.
I can imagine. I am sure you get a lot of exercise.
Yes, I do! I also get to spend a lot of time outdoors.
That is a great way to spend your time. I love being outdoors.
Me too! I love the fresh air and sunshine.
Do you have any pets on the farm?
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love animals.
They are great companions.
I am sure they are. I wish I could have a pet, but my kids are allergic to animals.
That is too bad. I love having animals around.
Me too. I love the companionship.
It is a lot of work, but it is worth it.
I am sure it is. I think I will get a pet when my kids are older.
That is a good idea. They will love having a pet.
